common.supportLine: If you have any questions, please contact us at {{supportEmail}}.
common.doNotReply: This is an automated message. Please do not reply directly to this email.
common.unsubscribe: To unsubscribe from these notifications, please update your email preferences in your account settings.

welcome.subject: Welcome to {{companyName}}!
welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.body: Thank you for registering with {{companyName}}. We're excited to have you on board!
welcome.nextSteps: Here are some next steps to get started:

verification.subject: Verify Your Email Address
verification.title: Email Verification
verification.body: Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.alternative: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.ignore: If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.title: Password Reset
passwordReset.body: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
passwordReset.alternative: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
passwordReset.ignore: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

passwordChanged.subject: Your Password Has Been Changed
passwordChanged.title: Password Changed
passwordChanged.body: Your password was successfully changed on {{date}}.
passwordChanged.warning: If you did not make this change, please contact our support team immediately.

mfaEnabled.subject: Two-Factor Authentication Enabled
mfaEnabled.title: MFA Enabled
mfaEnabled.body: Two-factor authentication has been enabled for your account.
mfaEnabled.info: Your account is now more secure. You will need your authenticator app to sign in.
mfaEnabled.backupCodesReminder: Please make sure you have saved your backup codes in a safe place.
mfaEnabled.warning: If you did not enable MFA, please contact our support team immediately.

mfaDisabled.subject: Two-Factor Authentication Disabled
mfaDisabled.title: MFA Disabled
mfaDisabled.body: Two-factor authentication has been disabled for your account.
mfaDisabled.warning: Your account is now less secure. We recommend enabling MFA for better protection.
mfaDisabled.reenable: To re-enable MFA, go to your security settings.

loginAlert.subject: New Login Detected
loginAlert.title: Security Alert
loginAlert.body: A new login to your account was detected.
loginAlert.warning: If this wasn't you, please change your password immediately and contact support.

accountLocked.subject: Account Locked
accountLocked.title: Account Locked
accountLocked.body: Your account has been locked due to multiple failed login attempts.
accountLocked.duration: Your account will be automatically unlocked in {{duration}}.
accountLocked.unlock: If you need immediate access, please contact support.

support.subject: Support Request: {{subject}}
support.title: Support Request
support.received: We have received your support request.
support.urgent: For urgent matters, please call our support hotline.
